# Packages     
      
```{r load-packages, message = FALSE}     
library(stringr)     
library(dplyr)     
library(pdftools)     
library(tidyverse)     
library(pdftables)     
library(qpdf)     
library(rJava)     
library(tabulizer)     
library(tabulizerjars)     
```     
      
# PDF     
      
```{r}     
pdf_subset("1941.Directory of electric utilities in the US pdf.pdf", page= 588:595, output= "New_hampshire_subset.pdf")     
```     
      
      
```{r}     
new_hampshire_file <- tabulizer::extract_text("New_hampshire_subset.pdf")     
new_hampshire_file2 <- str_split(new_hampshire_file, "\n")     
new_hampshire_file3 <- new_hampshire_file2[[1]]     
final_new_hampshire_file <- new_hampshire_file3[42:length(new_hampshire_file3)]     
```     
  
     
      
```{r}     
vector_company <- vector(mode="character", length=11)     
      
company_position <- 1     
last_position <- 1     
track_vector <- 1     
tracking_data_frame <- 1     
      
new_hampshire_company_code <- vector(mode="character")     
new_hampshire_company_name <- vector(mode="character")     
new_hampshire_company_eup <- vector(mode="character")     
new_hampshire_company_eor <- vector(mode="character")     
new_hampshire_company_ec <- vector(mode="character")     
new_hampshire_company_p <- vector(mode="character")     
      
      
for (i in 3:length(final_new_hampshire_file)) {     
  if (str_detect(final_new_hampshire_file[i], '28-')) {     
    new_hampshire_companies <- final_new_hampshire_file[last_position:i-1]     
         
    vector_company_copy <- vector(mode="character", length=1)     
         
    for (k in 1:length(new_hampshire_companies)) {     
      if (str_detect(new_hampshire_companies[k], '28-')) {     
        vector_company[track_vector] <- new_hampshire_companies[k]     
        vector_company[track_vector+1] <- new_hampshire_companies[k+1]     
        track_vector <- track_vector + 2     
             
        vector_company_copy[1] <- new_hampshire_companies[k]     
        vector_company_copy[2] <- new_hampshire_companies[k+1]     
      }     
           
      if (str_detect(new_hampshire_companies[k], "Utility Plant")) {     
        vector_company[track_vector] <- new_hampshire_companies[k]     
        track_vector <- track_vector + 1     
             
        vector_company_copy[3] <- new_hampshire_companies[k]     
      }     
           
      if (str_detect(new_hampshire_companies[k], "Operating Revenue")) {     
        vector_company[track_vector] <- new_hampshire_companies[k]     
        track_vector <- track_vector + 1     
             
        vector_company_copy[4] <- new_hampshire_companies[k]     
      }     
           
      if (str_detect(new_hampshire_companies[k], "Customers")) {     
        vector_company[track_vector] <- new_hampshire_companies[k]     
        track_vector <- track_vector + 1     
             
        vector_company_copy[5] <- new_hampshire_companies[k]     
      }     
           
      if(str_detect(new_hampshire_companies[k], "Purchased")) {     
        vector_company[track_vector] <- new_hampshire_companies[k]     
        track_vector <- track_vector + 1     
             
        vector_company_copy[6] <- new_hampshire_companies[k]     
      }     
    }     
        
    new_hampshire_company_code[tracking_data_frame] <- vector_company_copy[1]     
    new_hampshire_company_name[tracking_data_frame] <- vector_company_copy[2]     
         
    if(str_detect(vector_company_copy[3], "Utility Plant") & !is.na(vector_company_copy[3])) {     
      new_hampshire_company_eup[tracking_data_frame] <- vector_company_copy[3]     
    } else {     
      new_hampshire_company_eup[tracking_data_frame] <- NA     
    }     
         
   if(str_detect(vector_company_copy[4], "Operating Revenue") & !is.na(vector_company_copy[4])) {     
     new_hampshire_company_eor[tracking_data_frame] <- vector_company_copy[4]     
   } else {     
     new_hampshire_company_eor[tracking_data_frame] <- NA     
   }     
      
   if(str_detect(vector_company_copy[5], "Customers") & !is.na(vector_company_copy[5])) {     
     new_hampshire_company_ec[tracking_data_frame] <- vector_company_copy[5]     
   } else {     
     new_hampshire_company_ec[tracking_data_frame] <- NA     
   }     
      
   if(str_detect(vector_company_copy[6], "Purchased") & !is.na(vector_company_copy[6])) {     
     new_hampshire_company_p[tracking_data_frame] <- vector_company_copy[6]     
   } else {     
     new_hampshire_company_p[tracking_data_frame] <- NA     
   }     
      
    tracking_data_frame <- tracking_data_frame + 1     
    company_position <- company_position + 1     
    last_position <- i+1     
  }     
}     
```     
      
      
```{r}     
for (i in 1:length(new_hampshire_company_code)) {     
  if (startsWith(new_hampshire_company_code[i], "2") == FALSE) {     
    new_hampshire_company_code[i] <- gsub("(?<=\\()[^()]*(?=\\))(*SKIP)(*F)|.", "",      
                                     new_hampshire_company_code[i], perl=T)     
  }     
}     
      
for (i in 1:length(new_hampshire_company_eup)) {     
  string <- new_hampshire_company_eup[i]     
  string_vector <- str_split(string, "\\$")     
  new_hampshire_company_eup[i] <- string_vector[[1]][2]     
}     
      
for (i in 1:length(new_hampshire_company_eup)) {     
  string <- new_hampshire_company_eup[i]     
  m <- gregexpr('[0-9]+',string)     
  something <- regmatches(string, m)     
  something <- c(something[[1]])     
  new_hampshire_company_eup[i] <- paste(something, collapse = '')     
}     
      
for (i in 1:length(new_hampshire_company_eup)) {     
  if (new_hampshire_company_eup[i] == "") {     
    new_hampshire_company_eup[i] <- NA     
  }     
}     
      
for (i in 1:length(new_hampshire_company_eor)) {     
  string <- new_hampshire_company_eor[i]     
  string_vector <- str_split(string, "\\$")     
  new_hampshire_company_eor[i] <- string_vector[[1]][2]     
}     
      
for (i in 1:length(new_hampshire_company_eor)) {     
  string <- new_hampshire_company_eor[i]     
  m <- gregexpr('[0-9]+',string)     
  something <- regmatches(string, m)     
  something <- c(something[[1]])     
  new_hampshire_company_eor[i] <- paste(something, collapse = '')     
}     
      
for (i in 1:length(new_hampshire_company_eor)) {     
  if (new_hampshire_company_eor[i] == "") {     
    new_hampshire_company_eor[i] <- NA     
  }     
}     
      
      
for (i in 1:length(new_hampshire_company_ec)) {     
  string <- new_hampshire_company_ec[i]     
  m <- gregexpr('[0-9]+',string)     
  something <- regmatches(string, m)     
  something <- c(something[[1]])     
  new_hampshire_company_ec[i] <- paste(something, collapse = '')     
}     
      
for (i in 1:length(new_hampshire_company_ec)) {     
  if (new_hampshire_company_ec[i] == "") {     
    new_hampshire_company_ec[i] <- NA     
  }     
}     
      
      
for (i in 1:length(new_hampshire_company_p)) {     
  string <- new_hampshire_company_p[i]     
  m <- gregexpr('[0-9]+',string)     
  something <- regmatches(string, m)     
  something <- c(something[[1]])     
  new_hampshire_company_p[i] <- paste(something, collapse = '')     
}     
      
for (i in 1:length(new_hampshire_company_p)) {     
  if (new_hampshire_company_p[i] == "") {     
    new_hampshire_company_p[i] <- NA     
  }     
}     
      
      
state_name <- "New Hampshire"     
table_new_hampshire_company2 <- data.frame(new_hampshire_company_name, state_name,      
                                     new_hampshire_company_code,      
                                     new_hampshire_company_eup, new_hampshire_company_eor,     
                                     new_hampshire_company_ec, new_hampshire_company_p)     
      
colnames(table_new_hampshire_company2) = c("Company Name", "State", "Company Code",      
                                     "Electric Utility Plant (dollars)",      
                                     "Electric Operating Revenues (dollars)",     
                                     "Electric Customers",      
                                     "Energy Purchased (Kilowatt/hour)")     
      
write.csv (table_new_hampshire_company2, file = paste0('new_hampshire_table_company_1941', '.csv'))     
```
